dct_title_s: Rail road map of the southern states : shewing the southern & southwestern railway connections with Philadelphia
dct_description_sm: Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1862, by Thomas Kimber Jr.; Inset: Southern part of Florida. 25 x 18 cm.; Map depicts rail lines, roads, cities and towns, state and county boundaries, and rivers. 1863 edition published by Willis. P. Hazard is listed as Civil War Maps entry no. 44.; Description derived from published bibliography.
dct_creator_sm: Philadelphia Board of Trade. Committee on Inland Transportation
